component.name: Easy Pong
component.summary: Classic Pong fun reimagined with local multiplayer and modern themes.
component.description:
Relive the excitement of the original arcade phenomenon with a modern twist! Easy Pong brings you fast-paced paddle action that’s perfect for a quick challenge with friends—or taking on the computer in a battle of reflexes.
Features:
Local Multiplayer – Grab a partner and face off in classic 1‑v‑1 Pong matches.
Battle the Computer – Test your skills against the AI with three difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, and Impossible.
Multiple Themes – Choose from a variety of looks, including classic retro, modern neon, football field, matrix style, brown or yellow backgrounds, or even an inverted color scheme.
Keyboard and Joystick Support – Whether you prefer a keyboard, touchscreen, or game controller, Easy Pong has you covered.
Retro Sound Effects – Enjoy built-in sounds that capture the feel of vintage arcade machines.
Cross‑Platform – Easy Pong is made with Flutter and Flame, giving you a consistent experience across Android, iOS, Windows, Linux, macOS, and web browsers.
Coming Soon: Real-time online multiplayer! Challenge friends anywhere in the world.
No Personal Data Required Easy Pong does not collect any personal information or location data, so you can dive into the fun instantly.
Ready to Play? Download Easy Pong now and start serving up the nostalgia—perfect for quick matches, friendly competitions, or mastering your reflexes on the go!
